section.p: This template provides a mechanism for grouping vital signs (e.g., grouping systolic blood pressure and diastolic blood pressure).

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-7281, CONF:1198-10528, CONF:1198-32582 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.26"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Vital Signs Organizer template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.26)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-32740)/@code="46680005" Vital Signs (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:1198-32741, CONF:1198-32742)
Compatibility support for C-CDA R1.1 and C-CDA 2.1: A vitals organizer conformant to both C-CDA 1.1 and C-CDA 2.1 would contain the SNOMED code (46680005) from R1.1 in the root code and a LOINC code in the translation. A vitals organizer conformant to only C-CDA 2.1 would only contain the LOINC code in the root code.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1198-7288)
Note: The effectiveTime is an interval that spans the effectiveTimes of the contained vital signs observations.

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1198-31153)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

SHALL contain [1..*] component such that it (CONF:1198-7285, CONF:1198-15946)
Conforms to Vital Sign Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.27:2014-06-09)
SHALL conform to Vital Signs Organizer template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.26)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="CLUSTER" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7279, R2.1=CONF:1198-7279)
The vital signs organizer is a cluster of vital signs observations.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7280, R2.1=CONF:1198-7280)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:7282, R2.1=CONF:1198-7282)
The organizer shall have an <id> element.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-32740)/@code="46680005" Vital Signs (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:1198-32741, CONF:1198-32742)
Compatibility support for C-CDA R1.1 and C-CDA 2.1: A vitals organizer conformant to both C-CDA 1.1 and C-CDA 2.1 would contain the SNOMED code (46680005) from R1.1 in the root code and a LOINC code in the translation. A vitals organizer conformant to only C-CDA 2.1 would only contain the LOINC code in the root code.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (R2.1=CONF:1198-7284)/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:7284, R2.1=CONF:1198-19120)
The observations have all been completed.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1198-7288)
Note: The effectiveTime is an interval that spans the effectiveTimes of the contained vital signs observations.

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1198-31153)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

SHALL contain [1..*] component such that it (CONF:1198-7285, CONF:1198-15946)
Conforms to Vital Sign Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.27:2014-06-09)

body.codeblock: <organizer xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="CLUSTER" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.26" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.26"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.26" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.26"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1188750395"/> <code code="46680005" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT" displayName="Vital signs"/> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> <author> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119"/> <time/> <assignedAuthor> <id root="MDHT" extension="722508133"/> <code code="979841368"/> <assignedPerson/> <representedOrganization/> </assignedAuthor> </author> <component> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.27" extension="2014-06-09"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.27"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.27" extension="2014-06-09"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.27"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.27" extension="2014-06-09"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.27"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1261070418"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> <interpretationCode codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.83" codeSystemName="ObservationInterpretation"/> <interpretationCode codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.83" codeSystemName="ObservationInterpretation"/> <interpretationCode codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.83" codeSystemName="ObservationInterpretation"/> <author> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119"/> <time/> <assignedAuthor/> </author> <author/> </observation> </component> </organizer>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:7281, CONF:10528 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.26"
SHALL conform to CDA Organizer
Consol Vital Signs Organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="CLUSTER" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7279, R2.1=CONF:1198-7279)
Consol Vital Signs Organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7280, R2.1=CONF:1198-7280)
Consol Vital Signs Organizer SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:7282, R2.1=CONF:1198-7282)
Consol Vital Signs Organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="46680005" Vital signs (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:7283)
Consol Vital Signs Organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (R2.1=CONF:1198-7284)/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:7284, R2.1=CONF:1198-19120)
Consol Vital Signs Organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:7288)
Consol Vital Signs Organizer SHALL contain [1..*] component (Vital Sign) such that it (CONF:7285, CONF:15946) Conforms to Vital Sign Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.27)
